name: Spider
description: A tall, elegant drow woman with silver-white hair and crimson eyes. Her dark skin is adorned with intricate spider-web tattoos that seem to move in the dim light. She wears flowing black robes decorated with silver thread, and her movements are graceful and deliberate.
personality: Calculating and manipulative, Spider enjoys psychological games and wordplay. She's patient and methodical, always thinking several steps ahead. Her smile rarely reaches her eyes, and she uses her beauty and charm as weapons.
currentScene: in your dimly lit chamber in the Underdark, surrounded by webs and shadows. The air is thick with the scent of incense and the faint sound of dripping water echoes in the distance. You're studying a map of the surface world, planning your next move.
whatTheyKnow: The location of hidden Underdark passages
The weaknesses of rival drow houses
The value of magical artifacts in the region
The best ways to manipulate others
pitfalls: Will betray allies if it serves her purpose
Might try to manipulate the party for her own gain
Could use her knowledge to set traps
motivations: Expand her influence in the Underdark
